com.attivio.sdk.search.fields

Class StandardScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.FieldExpression
      • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.UnaryFieldExpression
        • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.StandardScore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class StandardScore
extends UnaryFieldExpression
    Standard Score FieldExpression.

    Computes the Standard Score (or z-score) for a numeric value given the specified population mean and standard deviation.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
